problem_names:
lemma theD:
  assumes "\<exists>!x. P x" and "x = (THE x. P x)"
  shows "P x" and "P y \<Longrightarrow> x = y"

lemma bij_betwE[elim]:
  assumes "bij_betw f A B" and "\<lbrakk> inj_on f A; f ` A = B \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows P

lemma bij_betwD[dest]:
  assumes "bij_betw f A B"
  shows "inj_on f A" and "f ` A = B"
translations:
abbreviation (input) qm (\<open>(_ ? _ : _)\<close> [0, 0, 10] 10) 
  where "C ? A : B \<equiv> if C then A else B"
abbreviation (input) if2 where "if2 a b \<equiv> (\<lambda>i. (i = 0 ? a : b))"

lemma theD:
  assumes "\<exists>!x. P x" and "x = (THE x. P x)"
  shows "P x" and "P y \<Longrightarrow> x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x &&& (P y \<Longrightarrow> x = y)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>!x. P x
  x = (THE x. P x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x &&& (P y \<Longrightarrow> x = y)

lemma bij_betwE[elim]:
  assumes "bij_betw f A B" and "\<lbrakk> inj_on f A; f ` A = B \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows P

proof (prove)
using this:
  bij_betw f A B
  \<lbrakk>inj_on f A; f ` A = B\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P

proof (prove)
using this:
  inj_on f A \<and> f ` A = B
  \<lbrakk>inj_on f A; f ` A = B\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P

lemma bij_betwD[dest]:
  assumes "bij_betw f A B"
  shows "inj_on f A" and "f ` A = B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on f A &&& f ` A = B

proof (prove)
using this:
  bij_betw f A B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on f A &&& f ` A = B
